price: (20) By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
